ourRoots.description: Welcome to Bloomora, your premier destination for exquisite floral creations. At Bloomora, we believe that flowers are more than just decorations—they're expressions of love, joy, and beauty that bring moments to life.
ourRoots.story: Bloomora was born out of a passion for floriculture and a desire to spread happiness through nature’s most beautiful gifts. Our founders, lifelong enthusiasts of floral design, envisioned a space where creativity blooms and every bouquet tells a story. Since our inception, we have dedicated ourselves to crafting breathtaking floral arrangements that leave a lasting impression.
ourRoots.offer1: Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, wedding, or just because, we tailor each bouquet to suit your unique needs and tastes.
ourRoots.offer2: Transform your special events with our bespoke floral designs, from intimate gatherings to grand celebrations.
ourRoots.offer3: Our collection evolves with the seasons, offering fresh and vibrant flowers that reflect the natural beauty of each time of year.
ourRoots.offer4: Beyond bouquets, we offer a variety of potted plants and garden gifts to bring greenery into your home or office.
ourRoots.philosophy: At Bloomora, we are committed to sustainability and supporting local growers. We source our flowers from eco-friendly farms and handpick each stem to ensure the highest quality. Our designs are a fusion of traditional elegance and modern flair, crafted with meticulous attention to detail.
ourRoots.ourTeam: Our talented team of florists combines artistry with a deep understanding of floral botany. Each member brings a unique touch to Bloomora, united by a shared love for creating stunning floral experiences. We take pride in our personalized service and strive to make every customer feel special.
ourRoots.join: We invite you to explore the beauty and joy that flowers can bring. Visit our shop, browse our website, or connect with us on social media to stay updated on our latest creations and floral tips. Let Bloomora be a part of your cherished moments, making them even more memorable with our beautiful blooms.Thank you for choosing Bloomora. We look forward to blossoming with you!
ourRoots.aphorism: Bloomora – Where Every Bloom Tells a Story
ourRoots.publications: Melissa and her work in the sustainable flower movement has been published in national and international publications, printed in The 50 Mile Bouquet by Debra Prinzing and interviewed on NPR.
ourRoots.learnMore: To Learn more about the sustainable floral movement please visit

weddingEvents.flowersForYouDescription2: in service and hospitality industries, venue coordination, wedding planning, and floral design, we create innovative, whimsical, and elegant designs to make your vision come to life.

weddingProcess.step1Description: Complete the form, think about how you want your day to unfold, and use as many visual terms as you can think of. We’ll look over your intake form and be in touch to schedule a consultation. For a full service 100+ guest count wedding, our minimum is $4800 in order to ensure a unique, lovely, and elegant event. A-la-carte services are offered for clients who are having a smaller, more intimate affair and who do not need as many components as our full-service clients; pricing varies.
weddingProcess.step2Description: Next we’ll meet at our studio and talk all about your vision: colors, decor, styles, blooms! We’ll get to know each other and look at inspiration. See some of our recent work in our gallery below to get inspired for your big day.
weddingProcess.step3Description: From there we'll begin the contract process by sending you a curated proposal complete with itemized line items and mood board for your review.
weddingProcess.step4Description: After a few edits, you’ll sign our contract and pay a retainer electronically. Over the following months, we’ll finalize any details and tie up loose ends by emails and meetings. Day-of, we will deliver, install, and clean-up so you can focus on time spent with your guests: eating, drinking, laughing, and dancing!

daysOutOfService.title: Days Out of Service
daysOutOfService.dates: Shop will be closed from the 4th to the 7th of June
